description: Number of partitions of n into 4 distinct nonzero squares.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
maple: b:= proc(n,i,t) option remember; `if`(n=0, `if`(t=0,1,0),      `if`(t*i^2<n, 0, `if`(i=1, 0, b(n,i-1,t))+      `if`(i^2>n, 0, b(n-i^2,i-1,t-1))))    end:a:= n-> b(n, isqrt(n), 4):seq(a(n), n=0..150);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 07 2013
mathematica: b[n_, i_, t_] := b[n, i, t] = If[n==0, If[t==0, 1, 0], If[t*i^2<n, 0, If[i == 1, 0, b[n, i-1, t]] + If[i^2>n, 0, b[n-i^2, i-1, t-1]]]]; a[n_] := b[n, Sqrt[n] // Floor, 4]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 150}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 29 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_*)
author: _David W. Wilson_
